title: Login Authentication Error
description: Users reporting 401 unauthorized errors despite correct credentials on the mobile app.

title: Payment Gateway Timeout
description: Stripe integration is timing out during the checkout process for international cards.

title: Update Footer Copyright
description: Need to update the footer year from 2023 to 2024 across all landing pages.

title: Slow Dashboard Loading
description: The main analytics dashboard takes over 5 seconds to fetch data from the API.

title: Broken Password Reset Link
description: The 'Forgot Password' email link redirects users to a 404 page.

title: Invoice Export as PDF
description: Feature request: Allow customers to download monthly invoices in PDF format.

title: Dark Mode Toggle Bug
description: The UI stays in light mode on Safari browsers even when dark mode is selected.

title: Database Connection Leak
description: Server logs showing multiple unclosed connections causing memory spikes.

title: Search Filter Not Working
description: Filtering by date range returns zero results regardless of the data present.

title: Mobile Header Overlapping
description: On iPhone 13, the navigation bar overlaps with the banner content.

title: Email Notification Delay
description: Welcome emails are arriving 30 minutes late after user registration.

title: Image Upload Limit
description: Users cannot upload profile pictures larger than 500KB. Request to increase to 2MB.
